name: Spirit Void (GDKO round 1)
description:
I thought I had one more day for the jam so it's a bit rough around the edges.
I hope it's still somewhat enjoyable.

CONTROLS A, Dmove left or rightSpacego into gorund/jumpW, Slook up or downS + Spacefall through grey platforms ABOUT

This game was created for GDKO 2022, round 1. The jams theme was to create a character controller with an unique ability.

CREDITS

So far everything was created by me, Federico
